html.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SECURE_PIN_SHIPPING_ADRES:
It looks like you chose a different address than what’s on file in your account.

Usually this is an office address or wherever you’re around during the days to sign for your package, which is just fine by us.

As an added precaution, select a phone for us to text you a code.
html.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SECURE_PIN_AUTHORIZATION_:
For the security of your Verizon account, in order to ship to an address other than your billing address you must complete the Online Authorization Process:

  • 1. Select the number where we can text you the Online Authorization Code.
  • 2. Click text me the code (text message is free and you will not be billed for this text message)
  • You should receive your code in less than a minute.
  • 3. On the next page you will need to enter your Online Authorization Code and click Confirm
html.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SHIPPING_METHOD_DISCLAIME:
• Next Day shipping is available till 11 PM ET for orders placed Mon—Fri (excluding holidays). Subject to inventory availability for destinations within the contiguous U.S. only.
  • 2 – Day orders placed by 8 PM ET Mon—Fri and by 2 PM ET on Sat (excluding holidays) arrive in 2 business days. All others arrive in 3 business days.
  • For Saturday by 12 PM delivery, orders must be placed by 4 PM ET on Friday (excluding holidays).
  • All orders subject to final destination and inventory availability.
html.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PORT_IN_DISCLAIMER:
Transferring your number to Verizon:

  • No charge to transfer your number to Verizon.
  • No need to cancel your existing service before transferring your number.
  • The phone with your previous service provider will work during the transfer, your new Verizon Wireless phone will be able to make but not receive calls.
  • Wireless numbers take 4-24 business hours to transfer; Landline numbers take 2-10 business days.
  • You'll receive a free text message from Verizon to your new phone once the transfer is complete.
html.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_ISPU_HOW_DOES_IT_WORK:
How Does In-Store Pickup Work?

Check for In-Store Pickup Availability- Search for a store by zip code or by state. Product availability will show for each store. Click the Pick From This Store button

Place your order online.

We will send you an email when your order is ready at the store. Please wait until you have received confirmation that your order is ready before heading into the store. Note: Please pick up your item(s) within 3 days of purchase.

Go to the store- Please bring photo ID and credit/debit card ONLY if used as payment. Only Account Owner or an Account Manager will be eligible to pick up the order.

label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SUMMARY_TAX_TIP: Tax is based on the retail price of your device(s)
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SUCCESS_MAIN_TITLE: Just confirm the details and you're good to go.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_CHECK_MAIN_TITLE: Check the highlighted areas below to make sure they are complete and/or correct.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_ALMOST_DONE_NOTIFICATION: Get excited, you're almost done. Just agree to the terms & conditions and place your order.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SHIPPING_ISPU_DETAILS_NOT: We'll send you an email when your order is ready. Remember to bring a government-issued photo ID and the purchasing
Keep an eye out on your email to find out when your order is ready (usually in an hour). And be sure to bring your photo ID and the credit card you used.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PAPER_FREE_BILLING_TOOLTI: Your account will be enrolled in paper-free billing. Instead of receiving a paper bill, you’ll receive monthly email and/or text reminders when your bill is ready to view and pay on the My Verizon Mobile app or My Verizon Web site. My Verizon registration is required when you enroll in paper-free billing. By un-checking the box, you will receive a paper bill in the mail.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SHIPPING_ADDRESS_TEXT_UPD: Get text updates about your order and shipping status
Messaging and data rates may apply.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_HOW_WOULD_YOU_LIK: How would you like to pay today?

In some cases, there may be taxes associated with your order in addition to your equipment and shipping charges. Standard taxing regulations apply. Any amount charged will be reflected in your confirmation.
Verizon Wireless provides a variety of payment options for you to complete your order. Please select the option that best suits your needs. Any amount charged will be reflected in your confirmation.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_BILLING_ADDRESS_S: To place an order with a new Billing Address, go to My Verizon -> My Profile -> Manage Billing Address. Update it, then log out, log back in and place the order.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_INFORMATION_SECTI: In some cases, there may be taxes associated with your order in addition to your equipment and shipping charges. Standard taxing regulations apply. Any payment type charged will be reflected in your confirmation.  and up to two gift cards
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_BTA_DESCRIPTION: This purchase will be billed to your Verizon Wireless account and will appear on your next billing statement. Transaction limits may apply.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_SAVED_CARD: Pay with a saved payment source
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_CARD_CVV_TOOLTIP: For your security and protection, we need the card verification number. It's the 3-digit number printed on the back of your Visa, MasterCard or Discover card. For American Express holders, it is the 4-digit number on the front of the card.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_NPNXX_OPTION_TRANSFER: I want to transfer my number
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_DEVICES_HEADER_SERVICE_AD: This address is used to determine your phone number with a local area code, and to calculate certain taxes and fees.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_TC_EPP_AGREEMENT_TITLE: Employee Phone Program Terms and Conditions
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BANNER_NEXT_DAY_SHIPPING: Want It tomorrow? Order By 11 PM ET with Next Day Shipping
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BANNER_NEXT_DAY_SHIPPING_: Depending on inventory availability for destinations within the US (excluding AK, HI) for orders placed M-F (excluding holidays). Next Day Shipping is not available for devices in pre-order status. Pre-order devices will ship as inventory becomes available.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BANNER_FREE_SHIPPING_TOOL: Free 2-day shipping when you order online M-F by 8PM EST, Sat by 2PM EST (excluding holidays), will deliver in two business days within the U.S. only (excluding AK & HI). 2-day orders placed after 2PM EST on Sat will deliver by Wednesday. Overnight shipping to destinations within the U.S. (excluding AK & HI) is generally available for orders placed M-F until 11PM EST, excluding holidays. Orders that contain a pre-order or backorder will ship via 2-day shipping on or prior to the committed date. Subject to credit authorization, verification and inventory availability.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BANNER_RETURN_POLICY_TOOL: You may return or exchange wireless devices and accessories purchased from Verizon Wireless within 14 days of purchase. A restocking fee of $35 applies to any return or exchange of a wireless device (excluding Hawaii).
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SUMMARY_UPGRADE_FEE_TOOLT: This one-time charge will be included in your "Due today" amount at checkout. This helps us cover support costs that come with powering America's largest and fastest 4G LTE network. After all, the best devices are only as good as the network that supports them.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SUMMARY_ACTIVATION_FEE_TO: This one-time charge will be included on your first monthly bill. This helps us cover support costs that come with powering America's largest and fastest 4G LTE network. After all, the best devices are only as good as the network that supports them.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SUMMARY_TRADEIN_APPRAISED: The appraised trade-in value of your old device is $$AMOUNT$
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SUMMARY_DUE_MONTHLY_DISCL: *This amount will appear on your recurring bill. Monthly amount does not reflect any taxes or surcharges which will appear on your recurring bill. Includes price plan and the features and services you have selected. Does not include other charges, taxes or surcharges.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SUMMARY_READ_TERMS: Please agree to the $TERMS_LINK$ before placing your order.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_TC_DPP_AGREEMENT_CONFIRMA: I acknowledge I have read the retail Installment sales agreement for purchased device and that copy was made available by Verizon Wireless. I agree to all terms and condition.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_TC_CUSTOMER_AGREEMENT_CON: I have read and agree to the Verizon Wireless Customer Agreement and Verizon Privacy Policy, including settlement of dispute by arbitration instead of jury trial, as well as the terms of my plan and any optional services I have agreed to purchase.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_TC_TRADE_IN_AGREEMENT_CON: I have read and agree to the  Trade-in Agreement
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_TC_EPP_AGREEMENT_CONFIRMA: I have read and agree to the Employee Phone Program Terms and Conditions and Verizon Privacy Policy, including settlement of dispute by arbitration instead of jury trial, as well as the terms of my plan and any optional services I have agreed to purchase.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SHIPPING_ADDRESS_VERIFICA: Before you can edit your shipipng address, we need to authorize your account by sending you an authorization code.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PORT_IN_AGREEMENT: I agree that I may incur costs to my existing service provider, including payment of an early termination fee, for transferring my number
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_HUM_TC_MAIN_SCREEN_VZW_TE: I have read and agree to the
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_HUM_TC_LINK_TEXT: hum by Verizon Terms of Service
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_ISPU_STORES_IN_AREA: Store(s) in your area have the device(s) available for store pickup right now
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SECURE_PIN_AUTHENTICATE_S: Please enter the Online Authorization Code that was sent to your line
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_BUDDY_MODAL_MESSAGE: This buddy/alternate upgrade will extend the contract of the providing line. Any discounts on the providing line due to currently being out of contract will be removed once this transaction completes. Loss of those discounts are not reflected in the summary on this screen.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_TAX_DISCLAIMER: The market you're in determines taxes, surcharge and fees, such as E911 and gross receipt charges. As of December 1, 2015, they can add between 7% and 45% to your standard monthly access and other charges. Monthly Federal Universal Service (17.9% of the interstate and international telecom charges, as of April 1, 2016; varies quarterly based on FCC rate), Regulatory (18 cents per voice line, 2 cents per data only line) and Administrative ($1.23 per voice line, 6 cents per data only line) charges are Verizon Wireless charges, not taxes, and are subject to change. For more details on these charges, call 1-888-684-1888.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_SIGNATURE_REQUIRED_DISCLA: Once your order is submitted, your shipping address can't be changed. Remember, your signature is required when your order is delivered
